title: ECD Connect Data Report
text:
Data report as of 21 October 2025


A summary of ECD Connect’s reach.
This includes the ECD Connect App (open-access), all ECD Connect Partner versions (white-label) and Grow Great’s CHW Connect. The numbers below represent all numbers since launch.



4


partner organisations




2,063


unique user sign-ups




12,422


total number of children added across all platforms

















Users are engaging with the ECD Connect tools and submitting data. [to be updated]




Since launch on 1 April 2025 to 13 October 2025



1,508


unique sign-ups




509


preschools added




1,522


children registered





17% of users who signed up 30+ days ago returned to the app within the past 30 days. This is higher than the standard global app retention rate of 7% by day 30.



As we roll out to more users, we are seeing an increase in the number of attendance registers saved per month.













Data from launch with first partner organisation in October 2024 to 15 October 2025



226


unique sign-ups




61


preschools added




887


children registered





With a smaller user base for ECD Connect Partner, attendance tracking has held fairly steady with a few bumps in engagement around in-person training sessions.




































Map title & notes will go here












Gender distribution of children










Number of children by age group





More demographics graphs to be added




TBD
















Percentage breakdown of income and expense categories during the selected period. Each pie shows the share of total income or total expenses contributed by each category.
